programme.title: Shared concerns in Britain and America
programme.short_synopsis: Considering an increased sharing of economic and social concerns across the Atlantic.
programme.medium_synopsis: Considering extended awareness of American issues in Britain, how similar the economic and social concerns of the two countries have become and thoughts on Alzheimer's disease.
